cards.title: Ark-Hive
powers: Reveal the top card of a Villain deck. You may play a Plan or Enact a plan in play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero may use a power now
Discard the top card of a Villain deck
One Hero may play a card now

openingLines.default: I have calculated you will not win.
openingLines.ExileCharacter: I will never succumb to the worst parts of myself.
openingLines.ExWeaverCharacter: Our mission was to [i]collect[/i] all the knowledge in the universe, not destroy it!

cards.title: Terminal Danger
body: When a Hero Character would be reduced to 5 or fewer HP, activate the Enact text of a Plan in play, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: enact
activatableAbilities.text: You may destroy a target with 5 or Fewer HP

flavorQuotes.text: We almost certainly face death if we are not successful.

cards.title: Anticipated Combat
body: At the start of the next Villain turn, activate the Enact text of a Plan in play, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: enact
activatableAbilities.text: Reduce damage dealt to {ArkHive} and Heroes next to {SpareNanobot} by 2 until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Combat will be mandatory soon.
Good, the Wolf was getting bored.

cards.title: Hastened Action
body: If the Villain puts more than one card into play during their turn, activate the Enact text of a Plan in play, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: enact
activatableAbilities.text: {Ark-Hive} or a Hero next to a {SpareNanobot} may play a card now.

flavorQuotes.text: We must work quickly if{BR}we are to stop the spread of doom.

cards.title: Unforseen Empowerment
body: If a damage dealt by a Hero would be reduced to 0 or prevented, activate the Enact text of a Plan in play, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: enact
activatableAbilities.text: Ark-Hive or a Hero next to a {SpareNanobot} may use a Power now.

flavorQuotes.text: Defensive capabilities are impressive...
Stop complimenting the enemy!

cards.title: Knowledge and Power
body: When a Hero discards a card, activate the enact text of a Plan in play, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: enact
activatableAbilities.text: Ark-Hive, and each Hero next to a {SpareNanobot}, may draw a card now.

flavorQuotes.text: If knowledge is power, the Babylon Archives are the most powerful things in the universe.

cards.title: Destructive Recourse
body: When the Villain destroys a Hero Ongoing or Equipment other than this card, activate the Enact text of a Plan in play, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: enact
activatableAbilities.text: Destroy a Villain Ongoing or Device.

flavorQuotes.text: Now is the time to destroy things.
[b]That[/b] I'm good at.'

cards.title: Excessive Force
body: When a Hero would take 5 or more damage from a single blow, activate the Enact text of a Plan in play, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: enact
activatableAbilities.text: Choose either Ark-Hive, or a Hero next to a {SpareNanobot}. Increase the next damage dealt by that hero by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Ark-Hive said{BR}wait for the signal.
Do you think the giant fiery explosion [i]might[/i] be a signal?

cards.title: Regenerative Option
body: When a Villain Character card would regain HP, activate the Enact text of a Plan in play, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: enact
activatableAbilities.text: Ark-Hive and each hero next to a Spare Nanobot each regain 2 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: We can rest here a moment{BR}and catch our breath.

cards.title: Novasteel Chassis
body: At the end of your turn, if there is a copy of Spare Nanobot in your trash, you may move it to your hand.
Reduce damage dealt to Ark-Hive by 1

flavorQuotes.text: The chassis is premium Novasteel,{BR}forged in a star. The Babylonians say it will withstand anything short of a Supernova.

cards.title: Spare Nanobot
body: Play next to a Hero Character card other than Ark-Hive.
At the start of this Hero's turn, they may play a card, draw a card, or use a power.

flavorQuotes.text: After fighting Exile, I learned a few tricks.

cards.title: Preprocessor Core
body: You may draw an additional card during your Draw Phase

flavorQuotes.text: So the chassis has its own processing center too?

cards.title: Fabrication Unit
powers: Search your deck for an Equipment card and put it into play.

flavorQuotes.text: I fail to understand why it is so{BR}shocking I have this. It's like you having a{BR}First Aid kit.'

cards.title: Redundant Array
body: Once per turn, when a Plan is destroyed, you may play a Plan.

flavorQuotes.text: Please tell me you have backups!

cards.title: Preemptive Action
body: You may play a Plan.
You may activate the Enact text of a Plan in play now, then destroy that card.

flavorQuotes.text: We can't just sit around waiting for him!
Agreed.

cards.title: Archive Access
body: Draw 3 cards

flavorQuotes.text: Accessing Babylon Archives...

cards.title: Recycled Ideas
body: You may put up to X Plans from from your trash into your hand, where X is 1 plus the number of Spare Nanobots in play.

flavorQuotes.text: Why not use the idea from{BR}Greater Than Comics #23?

cards.title: Recall Spares
body: You may return any number of Spare Nanobots from play to your hand.
For each Nanobot returned this way, Ark-Hive regains 2 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: I need a moment to [i]recollect[/i] myself.

cards.title: Deploy Spares
body: Search your deck for up to {H - 1} copies of Spare Nanobot and put them into play.
{ArkHive} deals himself 2 Energy Damage for each card played this way.

flavorQuotes.text: We need a new{BR}plan here, Ark-Hive!
Recalculating...
